head.title: Anne H. Rodgers and Daniel P. Rice Are Married

hedline.hl1: Anne H. Rodgers and Daniel P. Rice Are Married

block.p: LEAD: Anne Helen Rodgers, a daughter of Mr. and Mrs. James H. Rodgers of New York, was married yesterday to Daniel Phillips Rice, a son of Mr. and Mrs. James L. Rice of New Orleans. Msgr. George Bardes officiated at the Roman Catholic Church of St. Thomas More in New York.

LEAD: Anne Helen Rodgers, a daughter of Mr. and Mrs. James H. Rodgers of New York, was married yesterday to Daniel Phillips Rice, a son of Mr. and Mrs. James L. Rice of New Orleans. Msgr. George Bardes officiated at the Roman Catholic Church of St. Thomas More in New York.

Anne Helen Rodgers, a daughter of Mr. and Mrs. James H. Rodgers of New York, was married yesterday to Daniel Phillips Rice, a son of Mr. and Mrs. James L. Rice of New Orleans. Msgr. George Bardes officiated at the Roman Catholic Church of St. Thomas More in New York.
Mrs. Rice, 34 years old, is a television sales executive for Viacom International Inc., an entertainment conglomerate in New York. She is a cum laude graduate of Sweet Briar College.
The bridegroom, 32, attended the University of New Orleans and is a sales representative in the New York office of the United States Chamber of Commerce in Washington.
